pageContent: Introduction: The treatment of prostatecancer has recently been questioned because ofthe adverse effects it causes may out weigh the benefitsin many patients, so, it has increased interest in active surveillance for low-risk diseases and tissue preservation with focal therapy, thereby reducing the burden on medical care and side effects that may occur after radical prostatectomy and radiation therapy.

metaData.source:
Focal Treatment for Unilateral Prostate Cancer Using High-Intensity Focal Ultrasound: A Comprehensive Study of Pooled Data
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/29790383/
